languages.text: "Это кто-то, на кого сильно злится папа. Но папа на всех всегда злится — на дедушку, маму, дядю Дэггена, дядю Капеллана..."
"It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."
languages.original_text: "Это кто-то, на кого сильно злится папа. Но папа на всех всегда злится — на дедушку, маму, дядю Дэггена, дядю Капеллана..."

traits.locale_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mom, Uncle Daggen, Uncle Chaplain..."
"It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mom, Uncle Daggen, Uncle Chaplain..."
"It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."
"It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."
"It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

languages.text: “我爸爸非常生这个人的气，可他总是在生所有人的气，无论是爷爷、妈妈、达根，还是牧师……”
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: “我爸爸非常生这个人的气，可他总是在生所有人的气，无论是爷爷、妈妈、达根，还是牧师……”

languages.text: «Es alguien con quien papá está muy enfadado. Aunque papá siempre está enfadado con alguien: con el abuelo, con mamá, con Daggen, con Capellán...».
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: «Es alguien con quien papá está muy enfadado. Aunque papá siempre está enfadado con alguien: con el abuelo, con mamá, con Daggen, con Capellán...».

languages.text: 「パパがすごく怒ってる人でしょ。でも、パパっていつも皆に怒ってるの。おじいちゃんにも、ママにも、ダゲンさんにも、教戒官にも…」
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: 「パパがすごく怒ってる人でしょ。でも、パパっていつも皆に怒ってるの。おじいちゃんにも、ママにも、ダゲンさんにも、教戒官にも…」

languages.text: "Das ist jemand, auf den mein Papa sehr wütend ist. Aber mein Papa ist immer wütend auf alle – Opa, Mama, Daggen, Ordenspriester ..."
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist jemand, auf den mein Papa sehr wütend ist. Aber mein Papa ist immer wütend auf alle – Opa, Mama, Daggen, Ordenspriester ..."

languages.text: « Je sais que mon papa est très en colère contre cette personne, mais il est toujours en colère contre tout le monde. Papi, maman, Daggen, Chapelain... »
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que mon papa est très en colère contre cette personne, mais il est toujours en colère contre tout le monde. Papi, maman, Daggen, Chapelain... »

languages.text: "Babamın çok kızgın olduğu biri. Ama babam herkese kızar zaten. Dedeme, anneme, Daggen'a, Papaz'a..."
languages.original_text: "It's someone my dad is very mad at. But Dad is always mad at everyone — at Grandpa, Mum, Daggen, Chaplain..."

traits.locale_text: "Babamın çok kızgın olduğu biri. Ama babam herkese kızar zaten. Dedeme, anneme, Daggen'a, Papaz'a..."
